snippet: An emerging soprano, Sarah Shafer, had an already-famous accompanist, the pianist Richard Goode, Sunday at Town Hall.
abstract: Zachary Woolfe reviews song recital performed by soprano Sarah Shafer, accompanied by pianist Richard Goode, at Town Hall.
lead_paragraph: An emerging soprano, Sarah Shafer, had an already-famous accompanist, the pianist Richard Goode, Sunday at Town Hall.

headline.seo: Sarah Shafer and Richard Goode at Town Hall
headline.main: Soprano’s Song Recital Makes Room for Solo Turns by Its Accompanist
headline.print_headline: Soprano’s Song Recital Makes Room For Solo Turns by Its Accompanist
